programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.desc: When Mom is sick on a busy day at home, Tag offers to pick up the slack and take on her tasks for the day. programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Pooch’s, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. programme.desc: It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: No Mercy

programme.title: King Of Beggars

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days

programme.title: Black Mask

programme.title: Acts Of Vengeance

programme.title: The Infiltrator

programme.title: The Room

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school student suffering from severe motion sickness has to walk two hours to school every day. When a teacher learns of her plight, she signs her up for a race walking team.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam visits Peranakan food legend Violet Oon's restaurant, National Kitchen. He then heads to Chinatown to visit Aussie Dave Pynt's restaurant, Burnt Ends.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2

programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Mom is sick on a busy day at home, Tag offers to pick up the slack and take on her tasks for the day. Tag handles it at first, but when the responsibilities start to stack up, she realizes that being Mom is much harder than she thought. \ Tag and Scooch are excited to get to know Kit, who has organized a bunch of cat-ivities for the day. But when Kit realizes she accidentally scratched up Frank and Beans’s tree, she, Tag and Scooch find a way to make it up to them.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Pooch’s, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.desc: After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

programme.desc: Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers 1
programme.desc: Michael Mosley meets a 73-year-old jazz musician in Chicago and discovers why playing music can prevent hearing loss. He also reveals why aerobic exercise can help prevent the onset of glaucoma.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories 1
programme.desc: Starting on the treacherous Tea Horse Road stretching from southern China into Tibet, India and beyond. We discover the healing wonder of matcha tea in an ancient Japanese temple and hear about the extraordinary rescue of the forgotten Georgian tea gardens.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq 1
programme.desc: As he starts the final part of his journey deep into Iraq, Michael finds a local school in Baghdad and as he did in North Korea talks to the children about life in Iraq and what they hope to do in the future, and how they see the rest of the world. Michael then visits the ancient site of Babylon, a place he used to read about when he was studying the bible at school. He also gets access to enter the massive palace built by Saddam Hussein that overlooks the historic site.

programme.title: Earth 1
programme.desc: The almost implausible story of how our life-sustaining atmosphere came to exist.

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: A woman's life gets twisted one day because of her biological father who shows up after 28 years of absence. He had been thoroughly hiding his identity, afraid that he might be an obstacle in his daughter's life. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman,” the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: For Eagle Brothers
programme.desc: A family story about five brothers and a sister-in-law who suddenly became the head of the family after her husband's unexpected death.

programme.title: Music Bank

programme.title: Naeil's Cantabile
programme.desc: A classical music-themed romance drama. An arrogant top student at a college of music falls in love with an eccentric but energetic pianist, and the two seemingly opposites make each other's life complete.

programme.title: Good Luck!
programme.desc: A life story of three friends, one who is rich, one who is poor, and one who wishes to be rich, along with their families.

programme.title: Queen's House
programme.desc: A revenge story about a woman in the top 1% starting over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true ‘home'. A passionate drama of people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: Pump Up the Healthy Love
programme.desc: A thrilling and humorous “muscle-growth” drama where Do Hyeonjung , the hardcore gym rat and passionate trainer, shakes up the lives of anxious beginners with his bold and unorthodox coaching.

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant
programme.desc: Gourmet celebrities team up to explore the world of convenience stores and share their secret recipes!

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Filipino actor, model and swimmer Enchong Dee and his celebrity friend Ria, to explore the highs and lows of Hong Kong. They are eager to push their boundaries in this thrilling new adventure.

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: Actor Soo Ta plays the role of a gangster in his new movie and injures his co-star. Desperate to find a replacement, he invites a real gangster Gang Pae to complete the shooting. Gang Pae wants to be an actor and happily accepts it, but with the conditions that all fight scenes are to be shot with real weapons and no stuntman for Soo Ta is allowed!

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: Golden couple Olivia and Jackson are on the rocks, while boys' and girls' night descends into mayhem with fighting galore!

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S4)
programme.desc: Keith renovates a home in an Historic Preservation District. But the job gets complicated when they have to follow various restrictions set by the Preservation Board.

programme.title: How She Caught A Killer
programme.desc: The Route 40 Killer targets sex workers with an unknown motive. Detective Linda Murphy goes undercover and gets entangled in a chilling cat-and-mouse game, reminiscent of The Silence of the Lambs.

programme.title: A Lifeguard's Obsession
programme.desc: When a lonely, awkward lifeguard saves a well-known woman from drowning, he believes he's earned a place in her life... and her heart.

programme.title: Don't Scream, It's Me
programme.desc: Fifteen years ago, Liz's ex-boyfriend, Drew, was caught robbing a bank. Now, he's in her backyard, asking her to hide him. She agrees to help, but only once her husband is out of the house.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something
programme.desc: South Korean actor Kim Nam-gil embarks on a journey with his companion, Lee Sang-yoon. Their first destination is the Punch Bowl village, a place marked by the pain of the divided Korean Peninsula.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S16)
programme.desc: 4 Michelin star chef and MasterChef judge Jean-Christophe Novelli sets the first Pressure Test of the season with his 1992 dessert ‘Jack in the Box’, which helped him secure his first Michelin star.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael shows us how to make an impossibly delicious brunch menu of parm frittata with tomato sauce, served with a side of sausage and a simple salad that you can eat all day.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy heads to Chicago to one of the oldest buildings, the Berghoff, famous for their beer and schnitzel. Then he's off to Husk in Nashville, where this spot is putting a unique spin on Southern Classics.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: America's diverse culture is reflected in our food and in our love to mash it up to create delicious dishes. These creative fusions take our favourite foods and combine them with international flavours.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: Chefs put a Japanese twist on the classic burrito, Southern shrimp and grits get a crunchy addition, nachos get a sweet strawberry spin, chicken and waffles are twisted with a sugary street snack.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael cooks up some serious comfort food. With this much flavour, you'd never guess that these robust bull's-eye burgers, topped with sautéed onions and blue-cheese sauce, are actually plant-based.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael teaches us how to make a family-favourite recipe of pork cutlets with a fruity and savoury huckleberry sauce, served with potato salad, broccolini and fresh cherry tomatoes.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: As the remaining couples come together for their final dinner party, long-running feuds and bottled-up emotions boil over, exposing cracks in more than one relationship.

programme.title: House Of Deadly Lies
programme.desc: A stay-at-home mum takes in her struggling best friend to help her through a tough time - but soon, secrets are revealed that could tear her family apart and put everyone in danger.

programme.title: Ang Panday
programme.desc: A young blacksmith realizes his destiny when a malevolent demon bent on ruling the world unleashes an army of creatures on humanity.

programme.title: MIA
programme.desc: Mia Salazar (Coleen Garcia), a self-destructive, alcoholic doctor who joined the Doctor to the Barrios program to heal from the tragedy of her fiance's death meets the cheerful and nerdy forester Jay Policarpio (Edgar Allan Guzman). Together, the two will embark on a new journey.

programme.title: Camp Sawi
programme.desc: A group of brokenhearted women end up at a resort that specializes in helping people ease their pain.

programme.title: Matalino Man Ang Matsing, Naiisahan Din!
programme.desc: Their personalities are as opposite as the two poles, and the worlds they respectively belong to be perpetually at odds. Gener (Eddie Garcia) is an accomplished policeman whose track record in solving crimes is exceptional, while Mando (Willie Revillame ) is a slick con man who has a knack at wearing disguises.

programme.title: Ms. Kristina Moran, Ang Babaeng Palaban
programme.desc: Tina (Rosanna Roces) is a nightclub star performer whose dream is to one day make it big. Her desire for fame and fortune leads her to a string of exciting sexcapades with a variety of men. A hot, riotous movie that will keep you laughing and asking for more.

programme.title: Pakboys Takusa
programme.desc: Four playboy husbands sneak out to be with other women. But when one of them dates a girlfriend of a mafia boss, their lives are put at stake.

programme.title: Who's That Girl?
programme.desc: A one-of-a-kind romantic-comedy movie about a girl who is an alleged mistress of a business tycoon, husband to Eugene Domingo's character,and father to Luis Manzano's character.

programme.title: Baliktaran
programme.desc: A hilarious comedy about a couple switching roles to make their marriage work.

programme.title: Never Not Love You
programme.desc: It tells the story of young lovers who tries to build a life together until career opportunities sends them to a different country where their relationship will be tested.

programme.title: Teniente Gimo
programme.desc: Teniente Gimo is a famous urban legend and an infamous character in Ilonggo folk literature in Western Visayas whose colorful yet tragic life had been the subject of speculation and theories by the town folks in Iloilo.

programme.title: Ang Pagsanib Kay Leah dela Cruz
programme.desc: A lady cop who moves into a small town gets drawn to a case that involves a girl that's possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Pangarap Ko Ang Ibigin Ka
programme.desc: Although Rafael (Christopher de Leon) feels that he is not yet ready for another commitments, Alexis (Regine Velasquez) feels that he is the one she has been looking for.

programme.title: Two of Us
programme.desc: The story of two people who find each other while trying to make a living in a foreign country. But as time passes, underneath the sweet moments lie a toxic relationship that sparks violent tendencies.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man, who may just be in town to buy her family's parkland - which is also the location of the annual Christmas celebration

programme.title: ALF S2 E09 - Night Train
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S6 E06 - The Secret Admirer
programme.desc: In the sixth season of FRASIER, Frasier finally begins to believe that his life is going smoothly, for once. The rug is soon pulled out from under him when the radio station changes its format to a salsa -- leaving him without a job.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S4 E10 - The First (Part II)
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: North And South Book I E09 - Episode 5 (Part 1)
programme.desc: 1842. Two West Point military academy cadets form a bond of friendship strong enough to survive the forces leading to the United States' Civil War--forces that will rip their country into North and South

programme.title: Cheers S4 E16 - Cliffie's Big Score
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 E05 - Angels At The Altar
programme.desc: A series of challenging cases take the angels around the world to fight crimes, on behalf of their enigmatic millionaire boss, Charlie.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E05 - The Used Car Salesman
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: Bewitched S4 E05 - Cheap, Cheap
programme.desc: Samantha’s coronation as Queen of the Witches launches the Stephens family into another year of supernatural antics as they learn to cope with their young daughter’s developing magical powers.

programme.title: CSI S4 E20 - Dead Ringer
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: ALF S2 E09 - Night Train
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S6 E06 - The Secret Admirer
programme.desc: In the sixth season of FRASIER, Frasier finally begins to believe that his life is going smoothly, for once. The rug is soon pulled out from under him when the radio station changes its format to a salsa -- leaving him without a job.

programme.title: The Waltons S2 E13 - The Bequest
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: ALF S2 E10 - Isn't It Romantic
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: For nearly 70 years, Disney has pushed the boundaries of art and science through the work of a team of dreamers, designers, and builders known as the Imagineers.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Ancient cultures around the world have aroused fascination and provoked fear with curses and objects used to conjure them, like tablets and stones. But is there proof that some might have actually worked?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: The team continues to chase a tunnel that may run directly below the Garden Shaft and into the Baby Blob, where tests revealed high traces of silver and gold.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: After two years of waiting, the team receives the Muon topography data and learns that the cavity known as Aladdin's Cave may have more secrets to tell.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: In the second episode of a five-part event, it's back to the Forged in Fire Gladiator's Arena for two more ferocious one-on-one battles. Our current champion won two rounds and has a chance to win $75,000.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: A lifelong escape artist, Forrest Tucker, ends up in San Quentin prison. But despite his advanced age, he manages to engineer one of the most audacious prison breaks of all time.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Ancient cultures around the world have aroused fascination and provoked fear with curses and objects used to conjure them, like tablets and stones. But is there proof that some might have actually worked?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: After two years of waiting, the team receives the Muon topography data and learns that the cavity known as Aladdin's Cave may have more secrets to tell.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: Corey finds out if the force is with him when a seller comes in with two Star Wars Lego mini figures. Can he "C" his way to a deal, or will he run into a brick wall?

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: For nearly 70 years, Disney has pushed the boundaries of art and science through the work of a team of dreamers, designers, and builders known as the Imagineers.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S23)
programme.desc: Take a ride with the Pawn Stars as they check out a classic 1932 Roadster and a Rolls-Royce owned by the man in black himself, Johnny Cash.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S4)
programme.desc: Two entrepreneurs rise from the ashes of Prohibition by staking everything on two liquors and go on to save an industry, change cocktail culture, and create two of the most popular brands in the country.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: The buyers try their luck at a new facility in La Habra, where Ivy decides that school will be in session. Dusty brews himself up an interesting unit, while Kenny weighs the value of childhood memories.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: Ivy dons his bright white lucky sneakers in Van Nuys. Brandi and Lisa's "friendship" is tested as they go head-to-head on a pair of lockers. Kenny sets his fears aside and takes the plunge on a unit.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: Time's a-ticking when a seller brings a Mr. T wall clock to the shop. Will Rick and Corey see gold, or will they pity the fool? Rick checks out James Bond's credit card from the 2006 movie "Casino Royale".

programme.title: The Pickers (S17)
programme.desc: Mike and Frank blow the doors off of America's barns searching for some farm fresh picking folklore. "It's a BARN FIND!"

programme.title: The Pickers (S17)
programme.desc: From a storied boatyard in the Bronx to an untouched 1970s mancave in Oregon, the guys tackle two mind-blowing bicoastal picks.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Jordan Jonas (Season 6 winner) challenges three expert builders, Joel van der Loon (Season 7), Callie North (Season 3), and Britt Ahart (Seasons 3 and 5) to build a raft with a shelter.

programme.title: Sa Totoo Lang
programme.desc: Some of the country's finest actors joined the fun in this witty and totally hilarious look into the sex lives of lower middle class women who were old and single or separated, widowed, grass widowed, fooling around and everything else you could think of plus the assortment of men they met, fell for, cheated on, disliked, feared or anything else.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Alam Mo Ba?
programme.desc: In his rush to escape from the policemen, Mario disguised himself as an Arab. At that same moment, Teresa was waiting for the Arab prince she was supposed to marry, whom she has never seen before. In the rush, she thought Mario was her prince and brought him home to meet her parents.

programme.title: Tatlong Anak, Isang Ama
programme.desc: Set in the city of Olongapo during the last days of the US bases in the Philippines, this is a tale about the life of a musician and his three sons by three different women.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Miss Universe ng Buhay Ko
programme.desc: Andrew E and his gang rescued the damsels in distress from a robbery accident. He gave them food and lodging in his humble home, hopeful that someday, Charlene, one of the girls he rescued, would learn to love him.

programme.title: Sagad Hanggang Buto
programme.desc: When his parents are killed by assassins in the family car, Banjo is adopted by the thief who took his dead parents' wallet. Raised in poverty and used to surviving with his wits, he grows up as the town's resident hoodlum.

programme.title: Rocky N Rolly
programme.desc: The swindling trio of Rolly, Alex and Cleto earn big bucks by using different disguises to fool people. They soon join forces with ex-boxer, Rocky, who quit the sport after syndicate hench men beat him up for refusing him to join the game.

programme.title: Uubusin Ko Ang Lahi Mo
programme.desc: The canonigos led by Mayor Placido (Eddie Gutierrez) have enjoyed sole political control of the town for sometime now. But their abusive reign is threatened when Fortunato Guerrero (Robert Arevalo) plans to enter the political arena in the coming elections. The Guerrero and Canonigo clans both vow to eliminate the each other.

programme.title: Muling Buksan ang Puso (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Too much love suffocates and covetousness can breed hate.

programme.title: Working Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A humorous, but truly insightful look into the lives of women trying to make a living in the big city and coping with all the prejudice life bestowed on them because of their sex. This is also about their loves, their dreams, their weaknesses.

programme.title: Kaliwa't Kanan, Sakit ng Katawan
programme.desc: Ruben and Lorena are still on their honeymoon stage, but she has already decided to take on family planning the natural way. Disappointed and desperate, he gets into an illicit relationship.

programme.title: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Dina played a Filipina working with a US-based chemical company. Eddie played the Chief of Police assigned to protect the chemical company visiting group which fell victim to a terrorist gang. Eddie was only too obsessed to save the company because Dina happened to be his girlfriend.

programme.title: Wala Na Bang Pag-ibig?
programme.desc: For years, they have been the best of friends. Gemma is bratty Eric’s buddy, and to some extent, accomplice in his not too few escapades. But what if one day, all of a sudden, Gemma feels something different for Eric?

programme.title: Saan Nagtatago Ang Pag-ibig? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A marriage of convenience became a fulfilling relationship that eventually opened the eyes and hearts of everybody into the beautiful soul hidden inside the young man nobody wanted. Starring Vilma Santos, Tonton Gutierrez and Ricky Davao.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #41 Can we buy tickets? / To ask someone if you can do something, say the verb to indicate your desired action, followed by "koto ga" and "dekimasu," meaning something is possible. Then add "ka."

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Ren, from Vietnam, started a guesthouse in Nagano Prefecture. Her belief is: a welcoming environment leads to a more livable community. We take a look at interactions between Ren and the townspeople.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: This program highlights the "Osaka Month" feature aired in May, showcasing Osaka's food culture, such as udon and seafood. It also covers the NHK WORLD-JAPAN PR event at NHK Osaka.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today: Sado Island - Into the Mystic Dreams.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: BIZ STREAM
programme.desc: This episode shows how services offering immersive cultural experiences are helping attract travelers to lesser-known towns and cities in Japan.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: With colorful pile fabric and comfortable knits, Wakayama prefecture is drawing global attention as a textile hub. We bring you striking images of its machines and the beat of its factories.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker."

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Brazilian Vanusa Santiago, a professional dancer who teaches samba in Kobe, Hyogo Prefecture, as well as American Kenneth Mukai, who runs a craft beer brewery in Niyodogawa, Kochi Prefecture.

programme.title: NEWSLINE ASIA 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Magical Japanese "Ship"
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to ships. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Tsukamoto Shinya's film Hokage (Shadow of Fire) won the NETPAC Award for Best Asian Film at Venice in 2023. Tsukamoto's recent films focus on wartime stories. We ask him about his creative process.

programme.title: Tokyo Cut Glass
programme.desc: Edo Kiriko cut glass techniques, passed from artisan to artisan for over 100 years. More women who now pursue the craft create popular new designs.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Good or Evil Soul
programme.desc: We visit the Yoshiwara district, Edo's most prominent pleasure quarters. Among the lavish spenders, courtesans and apprentices, small humanoid creatures scurry about - what could they be up to?

programme.desc: Ren, from Vietnam, started a guesthouse in Nagano Prefecture. Her belief is: a welcoming environment leads to a more livable community. We take a look at interactions between Ren and the townspeople.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: This program highlights the "Osaka Month" feature aired in May, showcasing Osaka's food culture, such as udon and seafood. It also covers the NHK WORLD-JAPAN PR event at NHK Osaka.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Tsukamoto Shinya's film Hokage (Shadow of Fire) won the NETPAC Award for Best Asian Film at Venice in 2023. Tsukamoto's recent films focus on wartime stories. We ask him about his creative process.

programme.title: Tokyo Cut Glass
programme.desc: Edo Kiriko cut glass techniques, passed from artisan to artisan for over 100 years. More women who now pursue the craft create popular new designs.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Good or Evil Soul
programme.desc: We visit the Yoshiwara district, Edo's most prominent pleasure quarters. Among the lavish spenders, courtesans and apprentices, small humanoid creatures scurry about - what could they be up to?

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Fraud victims who pay big retainer fees to attorneys promising to recover their losses often lose that money too. We show how online ad agencies are driving and managing these questionable schemes.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today: Sado Island - Into the Mystic Dreams.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Detecting vulnerable plaques is now possible using the latest intravascular imaging technology. We focus on how this can help with early detection of heart disease and prevention of its recurrence.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Where We Call Home

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Magical Japanese "Ship"

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Travelogue
programme.desc: Travelogue is a 30-minute travel program. Through the journeys of our intrepid hosts, we experience the beauty, culture and mystery of China, discovering how people live in this vast country and showcasing China's transformation to the world.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: Global Watch

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Magical Morphle
programme.desc: My Magic Pet Morphle follows the adventures of Mila and her magical morphing pet, Morphle. Whether they need to stop a magic pet who doesn't know how to control their powers, the town Bandits from stealing things, or the mischievous Orphle from causing havoc, Mila and Morphle always work together to help out!

programme.title: Orbits' Small Problem
programme.desc: Rob the Robot and his friends, Orbit, Ema, T.K., and Squeak, take adventures across the many amazing planets in the Robot Galaxy in a fantastical world of fun and imagination. Each mission requires the help or involvement of his friends and their unique abilities, be it T.K.’s logical thinking or Ema’s language and early reading knowledge. The adventures, while creative and fun, remain sufficiently rooted in “real life” experiences of preschoolers not only to intrigue and entertain but still make sense. Fun, laughter and learning are just a rocket - hop away!

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 119
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 119
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Veggies and Eggs
programme.desc: Netflix's Chef's Table star Asma Khan and Gourmet Traveller editor Joanna Hunkin join Adam to take on two kitchen staples: veggies and eggs.

programme.title: This Place - Bila to the Garuwa
programme.desc: In Birpai country, the Gathang language is spoken. It has two words for river, "bila" and "dungang". The Hastings River is extremely important for the Birpai people, as it supplied plentiful food and a place to meet.

programme.title: ABC News Regional - Episode 20
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: The Homes That Built Australia - It's Time! (1960 - 1975)
programme.desc: The Australian Dream continues to evolve, as underrepresented Australians work to secure a sense of home and belonging for themselves and their families - whether it's equality or immigration reform, the fight has just begun.

programme.title: Heywire - Draven from Bunbury, WA
programme.desc: Heywire winner Draven is a boxer and a podcaster. He wants to raise the profile of wheelchair boxing so other people living in regional areas can train and compete.

programme.title: Grand Designs Transformations - Mornington Peninsula and Exley
programme.desc: On the Mornington Peninsula, an overgrown sloping bush block is transformed into a family retreat designed to embrace its natural surrounds, while a heritage-listed mid-century classic home in Sydney gets a modern upgrade.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 101
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: The Nutcracker
programme.desc: Tchaikovsky's score, George Balanchine's choreograpy and Oscar®-winner Kevin Kline's narration combine to tell the timeless story of young Marie, who falls asleep after a Christmas party to dream that her gifts come to life.

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: When a clerical error causes a clash in wedding dates, two best friends who'd do anything for each other find themselves in a no-holds-barred, take-no-prisoners struggle that threatens to erupt into all-out war.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: A poor laborer father and his young son's lives are turned upside down when a fascinating and strange new pet enters their world. Amid the resulting comic mayhem, they ultimately learn a poignant lesson about the true nature of family and the things money can't buy.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard
programme.desc: After the death of his brother, an expert street dancer goes to Georgia to attend Truth University. But his efforts to get an education and woo the girl he likes are sidelined when he joins in his fraternity's effort to win a step dancing competition.

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A ghost stranded in New York City is determined to communicate with the woman he loves. He teams with a 'psychic' to master the skills of the spiritual world.

programme.title: Children Of A Lesser God
programme.desc: Based on the hit Broadway play, it’s the uplifting love story of John Leeds, an idealistic special education teacher, and a headstrong deaf girl named Sarah. Soon their teacher/student relationship blossoms into love.

programme.title: The Nutcracker

programme.title: Star Trek (2009)
programme.desc: A prequel focusing on a young James T. Kirk and Mr. Spock, chronicling their first meeting at Starfleet Academy and their first space mission.

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A Columbia graduate student unknowingly gets caught up in a terrifying nightmare masterminded by a Nazi fugitive. Lawrence Olivier was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor.

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Artiste Yin Qing enters Hell's Gate through a supernatural TV show and reunites with her late friend Mei Qi. At Mei Qi's gravesite, Yin Qing encounters Mei Qi's husband, Dong Sheng, and a series of mysterious incidents unfold. She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: The Revenge
programme.desc: Ruo Wei returns to her childhood home with two best friends, and reunites with her cousin who has always lived there. While they plan to enjoy their trip, they are constantly haunted by paranormal events, ending up in a terrifying experience with unexpected outcome.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Artiste Yin Qing enters Hell's Gate through a supernatural TV show and reunites with her late friend Mei Qi. At Mei Qi's gravesite, Yin Qing encounters Mei Qi's husband, Dong Sheng, and a series of mysterious incidents unfold. She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: The Revenge
programme.desc: Ruo Wei returns to her childhood home with two best friends, and reunites with her cousin who has always lived there. While they plan to enjoy their trip, they are constantly haunted by paranormal events, ending up in a terrifying experience with unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A middle-aged woman holds a restaurant manager hostage. First responders hurry to locate a young woman who flipped her car. A married couple in Ohio defend themselves after an intruder enters their home.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Christine and Jason Harris fell in love young. Christina finds Jason caring and supportive and after marrying, they have two children. But then Christina makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: One FBI undercover agent meets with suspects in Denmark in an effort to retrieve one of the world's lost treasures; another agent takes on an unlikely suspect believed to be planning a murder for hire.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Tales of toxic love triangles—wives who stray from their husbands with disastrous results, a deadly case of online catfishing, and a lonely young woman who has an affair with a killer.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a loving wife and mother is found stabbed to death inside her home, a team of investigators dedicate eight years to finding her killer.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a family's home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A woman attacks a bus driver in an out-of-control road rage incident; a man is beaten to within an inch of his life in a hate crime; a woman is brutally assaulted by her ex in a dollar store. And more.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a Georgia college student disappears, police open an investigation into a possible hate crime and abduction. However, Dr. Jamie Downs uncovers evidence that spins the case in a new direction.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: Orion and Kendra are revealed to everyone, and tensions boil over when Jacob goes head to head with the other participants. Sheriff Dance and Chief Capehart reveal what lies ahead for PCDC.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: High school sweethearts, reunited after 30 years, celebrate their birthdays by taking a cruise together. After a night of drinking during an excursion, one of them ends up beaten and strangled to death.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: Two young sisters hide in their closet to remain hidden from the men who broke into their house. An accidental leg amputation at an Orlando recycling plant has rescue workers racing to the scene.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: Police race across three states to catch a bus carrying an alleged gunman threatening to kill everyone onboard. On the coast of Florida, a toddler fights for her life after being found face down in a pool.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When the body of a Jane Doe is found dumped on a roadside, it's up to Dr. Satish Chundru to identify her and find out how she died, spawning an investigation retracing the victim's last night.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: Undercover agents Lyle Kirian and Brian Townsend embed themselves in two different but equally dangerous worlds in order to investigate suspected local gang members and the Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: In June 1993, 11-year-old Jeralee Underwood leaves home for her local newspaper round. It’s dusk when neighbours confirm that she’s been abducted and forced into a car by an unfamiliar man.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Heartbreaking accounts of families torn apart by crime. Ashley Wallace, who was almost killed by her own mother, Jenny Carrieri, whose search for her sister's murderer consumed her life.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a loving wife and mother is found stabbed to death inside her home, a team of investigators dedicate eight years to finding her killer.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Kerri has an online gambling addiction that is tearing her family apart. Devonte's gaming addiction makes Lisa question his ability to be a good father and husband.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach whole numbers up to 10 000, ordinal numbers up to 100th, and money up to PhP1000. These videos also teach addition and subtraction of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes discuss about writing different kinds of sentences, descriptive paragraphs, and diaries. These episodes also show how to use common and proper nouns, plural forms of regular and irregular nouns, and how to read words, phrases, and sentences with short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kinalalagyan ng mga lalawigan sa rehiyong kinabibilangan ayon sa katangiang heograpikal nito.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about ways of sorting materials and describing them as solid, liquid or gas based on observable properties.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng mga pangngalan at mga panghalip. Tinatalakay din dito ang pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita, pagtukoy ng mga elemento ng kuwento at pagsagot ng mga tanong tungkol dito.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about whole numbers up to 100,000. These also teach multiplication and division of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the parts of a paragraph, different resources, and significant details of different text types. These also talk about various ways of identifying the meaning of words.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pagkakakilanlan ng bansa ayon sa mga katangiang heograpikal gamit ang mapa.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes focus on grouping different materials based on their properties. These episodes also discuss the changes that materials undergo when exposed to certain conditions.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pangngalan, panghalip, magagalang na pananalita, at mga sanggunian. Pag-uusapan din dito ang pagsagot sa mga tanong, pabibigay ng hinuha, opinyon, solusyon, pagsunod-sunod ng mga pangyayari, at pagsusuri ng maikling pelikula.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the four fundamental operations involving fractions and decimals.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about analyzing images, interpreting the meaning of visual media, and making co ections between information viewed and personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa bahagi ng Pilipinas sa globalisasyon batay sa lokasyon nito sa mundo gamit ang mga kasanayang pangheograpiya at ang ambag ng malayang kaisipan sa pag-usbong ng nasyonalismong Pilipino.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the different types of mixtures and their characteristics and the different techniques to separate mixtures.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri at pagsusulat ng tula, bugtong, sawikain, talata, karunungang-bayan, at pananaliksik.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of factors of polynomials, rational algebraic expressions, linear equations and inequalities in two variables, systems of linear equations and inequalities in two variables and linear functions.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes show how to use modals, adverbs, adjectives and nouns. These videos also focus on determining the meaning of words and expressions and citing sources.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa interaksiyon ng tao sa kaniyang kapaligiran na nagbigay-daan sa pag-usbong ng mga sinaunang kabihasnan na nagkaloob ng mga pamanang humubog sa pamumuhay ng kasalukuyang henerasyon.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes are about Newton’s three laws of motion, force, power, and different kinds of energy. These also teach the propagation of sound, properties and characteristics of visible light, heat and temperature, and the effects of heat on the body, and electricity.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa mga mitolohiya, parabula, at nobela. Ipinapaliwanag din dito ang wastong paggamit ng pokus ng pandiwa at panghalip, paggamit ng angkop na hudyat sa pagsunud-sunod ng mga pangyayari.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of sequences, polynomials and polynomial equations.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes show how to use information from various resources, determine the effect of textual aids, and analyzing materials viewed. These videos also focus on evaluating texts.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sanhi at implikasyon ng mga hamong pangkapaligiran upang maging bahagi ng pagtugon na makapagpapabuti sa pamumuhay ng tao.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episode talk about the relationship among the locations of volcanoes, earthquake epicenters, and mountain ranges.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes feature the life of learners under alternative learning system. These episodes also focus on the process of pla ing, setting up, ru ing a small business, and these also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episode teach about the objects in the environment, its properties or attributes, its similarities and differences. These episodes also talk about letters and body parts and their uses.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach rhyming words, greetings and leave-takings, and the different elements of a story.

programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: Kalye Kweens ep 12
programme.desc: Mandy and Telly are former best friends who are now the leaders of neighboring communities that have been perennially in conflict. Their game of one-upmanship worsens when both their sons become best friends but are smitten with the same girl

programme.title: The Kasambahay S2 ep 17
programme.desc: Guia (Donnalyn Bartolome) transfers to a different neighborhood, meets new faces. New kasambahays, new masters and a whole new adventure packed with fun and laughter.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Boyong Mañalac, Hoodlum Terminator (Father's Day Special)
programme.desc: He used to be an outlaw, now, he is feared by the criminals. An action-filled chapter in the life of Boyong Manalac, on how he terminates the notorious hoodlums one by one in cold blood, and how this affects him and his family.

programme.title: Blue Jeans ep 6
programme.desc: BLUE JEANS is a youth-oriented drama that follows the intersecting and intertwining lives of 6 present-day Filipino working students in the university belt.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 5
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 30
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 15
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 10
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 2
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.
